title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat, embed, generate completions, or pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers. Same capabilities as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, retrieval, and tool use.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. No API keys, runs entirely local.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Generate, chat, pull models, list running processes.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line wrapper with fzf model picker, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset. Use Ollama models in production-grade retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function calling, voice chat, PDF Q&A, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop app (Tauri + React) for chatting with local models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus Docker Compose examples for local and server deployments.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for declarative Ollama installs with automatic model pull.
